Title: Southeast Asia can harness vast renewable resources to meet fast-growing electricity demand
Summary: Southeast Asiaâ€™s electricity demand is rising at one of the fastest rates in the world, underscoring the need for countries to diversify energy supplies and reinforce grid infrastructure. A new IEA report released today highlights how countries in the region can leverage their abundant renewable resources, notably wind and solar PV, to meet soaring demand and achieve their energy priorities.
